subject: Attention Please.
body:
Attention Please.
I write to asked from you if you still interested in receiving your over due  funds again , contact me now via my phone number or email me, text me here , because your funds has been approved 
Phone Number ..+15407165197
Am waiting for you as I am here to help so you receive your funds immediately once you are ready.
God bless .
Best Regards .
Mr Charles Colocino 
IMF .

subject: Re:   Attention Please.
body:
Hello Mr. Charles Colocino,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, I am quite intrigued by your message regarding my overdue funds. Could you please provide me with more details about this? How exactly did my funds get approved and what is the process for receiving them?

I appreciate your assistance in helping me receive these funds. However, before we proceed any further, I would like to know more about the legitimacy of this opportunity. Can you please share some information about the organization or institution that has approved my funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Terry

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
You can receive your funds through online banking or bank to bank wire
transfer or atm card, just tell me how much you can afford now so we can
get all legal documents to proceed immediately .

Total amount is $27000 usd only..

God bless .

Best Regards .
Mr Charles Colocino
IMF .

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hello Mr. Charles Colocino,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer to help me receive funds through online banking or bank wire transfer. Can you please provide more details about the process and how it works? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "legal documents"? What kind of documents are required and why?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Terry
